attributes.action: Concentrate efforts on REVAMPING DILAPIDATED AND EMPTY BULIDINGS rather than continuously building new ones in overcrowded areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are too many empty shops and buildings around doing nothing useful except wasting space, whilst nearby, hundreds of flats and houses are being built in already crowded areas. It is important, with an evergrowing population, that attention is focused on making the most of what is already there rather than creating new towns full of flats all over the place.
